page.title: 16Leisure Activities
page.content: Many of the children in the village enjoy the numerous clubs and activities going on most evenings and weekends.Weekday activities include Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,and Guides.There is also a football club in the evening to provide training sessions. A youth club on Friday evenings caters for the possible range of youngsters in three sessions.Karate club also enjoys good support. Children with wider interests are within easy reach of the Leisure Centres in Milton Keynes only a few miles away.Here they can take part in Swimming,Gymnastics,Judo and many other sports.Modern dance is particularly popular with the girls at the present time. The present vogue for the boys is BMX bike riding and this takes place on any rough ground that can be found
